Package com.tloj.game.rooms

Class Room

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.rooms.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
HostileRoom, LootRoom, StartRoom, TrapRoom
public abstract class Room extends Object
Abstract class that represents a room in the game
